text: Hi Nathaniel, you can find all of the parameters for the form HubL tag here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-modules#form>
idk if someone’s working on the Previewer for custom modules but the delete button appears to have been lost. (when previewing a custom module with a repeatable group/field)
ahh interesting, it doesn’t show up until you add a new item. there’s a minor bug there.
